title: E-Learning Design Quality Improvement Process Applying Software Engineering Principles

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Secondary Social Curriculum Content and Basic E-Learning Platform Proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for current teachers and educational practitioners to strengthen e-learning content design competencies by applying software engineering principles.

learning_goals: Learners can apply software engineering design principles (abstraction, modularity, reusability, etc.) to e-learning design.
Design SCORM-compliant e-learning modules with interoperable standards
Develop maintainable and scalable e-learning content architecture
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
